name: RECORDINGS004: maple syrup
release_bio: The fourth release from the RECORDINGS WRC imprint.
Featuring hot basses, warm leads, buttery textures and hearty recordings from Wash And Fold Laundry Service
Recorded, Mixed, and Mastered by Ian Rios

name: RECORDINGS003: balsamic
release_bio: The third release from the RECORDINGS WRC imprint.
Sample pack of field recordings taken across the world.
Recorded, Mixed, and Mastered by Robert Dylan Smock (dyl_pykl)

name: RECORDINGS002: ranch
release_bio: Sample pack of one shots, techno pounders, drones and more taken from the LYRA-8 synthesizer.
Recorded, Produced, Mixed, and Mastered by ofoot

name: RECORDINGS001: honey
release_bio: The first release from the RECORDINGS WRC imprint.
Sample pack of basses, drums, leads, textures, and of course, field recordings.
Recorded, Produced, Mixed, and Mastered by Ian Rios (whythough?)
